Class RectangleStrategy

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.utoronto.utm.strategies.ShapeManipulatorStrategy
      • ca.utoronto.utm.strategies.RectangleStrategy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class RectangleStrategy
extends ShapeManipulatorStrategy
    A strategy class that handles the creation and modification of Rectangle objects.
    Author:
    CSC207 Group
